column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My Wedge Salad was just okay. Maybe 2/10. The thick bacon is lovely
column2: but doesn't save an otherwise boring salad. Maybe if I got more dressing on the side? My biggest problem is that it was two pretty large iceberg lettuce wedges with some crumbled blue cheese and the bacon
column3: covered with a modicum of dressing. Soon
column4: all I was eating was undressed iceberg--which
